headline.main: Stalingrad Defenders Gain; Punch Holes in Flank on Don; Russians Stiffen, Clear Buildings of Foe -- Inflict Big Loss With Slight Reverse -- Germans Admit Battle Shifts RED ARMY HOLDING STALINGRAD LINES

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Saturday, Oct. 3 -- The Red Army punched more holes in the Nazi flank northwest of Stalingrad yesterday and bettered its positions in a building-to-building fight inside the ruined city as the Volga battle entered its seventh week.
abstract: USSR forces gain in bldg-to-bldg fighting, Stalingrad; many Ger losses reptd; USSR forces withdraw to defensive positions, Mozdok lines; Axis wedge destroyed, Novorossiisk; some Ger divs losses reptd up to 70%; Stalingrad battles described; Gers claim Orlovka taken
snippet: MOSCOW, Saturday, Oct. 3 -- The Red Army punched more holes in the Nazi flank northwest of Stalingrad yesterday and bettered its positions in a building-to-building fight inside the ruined city as the Volga battle entered its seventh week....
